snippet: After Della Murray kicked a crack cocaine habit, she wrestled with bouts of depression and has struggled to make ends meet.
abstract: East New York Clubhouse, which offers support to adults with mental illness, helps Della Murray of Brooklyn, giving her transitional employment and money to keep her belongings in storage prior to moving into her own apartment; program is one of many offered by Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: After Della Murray kicked a crack cocaine habit, she wrestled with bouts of depression and has struggled to make ends meet.

headline.print_headline: She Vanquished A Cruel Addiction, But Challenges Remain
headline.main: She Vanquished a Cruel Addiction, but Challenges Remain

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
